name: Grandma's Classic Cheese Ball
author: Sharon Helms
summary: My grandmother made this classic cheese ball every Christmas. It's simple and very tasty.
ingredients: 2 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature
1 teaspoon water, or more as needed
2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, at room temperature
1 (5 ounce) container Old English Sharp Proc Cheese Spread KFT
directions: Combine 2 ounces cream cheese, blue cheese, and vinegar in a small bowl
Add water, stir until creamy, and transfer to a larger bowl
Add remaining cream cheese, processed cheese spread, onion, and onion powder; mix until well combined
Mix in 1/2 cup walnuts until incorporated and shape into a ball
Spread plastic wrap on the counter and spread remaining walnuts over top
Roll cheese ball in nuts until completely covered, then place into a bowl to help it keep its shape
Refrigerate until firm, 8 hours to overnight
